pages.name: The Grub
pages.text: A grub, used to feed O-Frogs to breed them.
The Grub item, dropped from a grub when killed.

pages.name: The Headless Horseman
pages.text: The Headless Horseman, occasionally found roaming the night on his steed.
The Coat Oscillator item, which can only be used in Creative. It can switch between all the base coats of an O-Animal.
The Marking Oscillator item, which can only be used in Creative. It can switch between all the markings of an O-Animal.
Riot Horse Armor comes with Deadly Dinos compatibility.
The American Soldier Draft horse breed comes with Deadly Dinos compatibility.
Obsidian Horse Armor comes with Medieval Embroidery compatibility.
If TFC is installed, O-Horses can use TFC Horse Armors.
Caparisons come with Medieval Embroidery compatibility. They can be placed in the decor slot of an O-Horse and can be worn alongside armor. They are simply cosmetic and offer no protection.

Rump Straps come with Medieval Embroidery compatibility. They can be placed in the decor OR armor slot of an O-Horse, so they can be worn alongside armor or blankets. They are simply cosmetic and offer no protection.
